{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=TG1682G |revision=ER 1 |series=XB3-24DS |fcc_date=05/19/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=UIDTG1682 |ic_id=6670A-TG1682 |pwr_v=115 |pwr_amp=1 |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=DHCE2652;Puma 6; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646B-HCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9381;AR9381-AL1A, PSW970\002B, 1344, TAIWAN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=DECT SoC;DSP Group;DCX81;DSPGroup, DCX81AC0BFAE3ENC, (C)(M)2010 DSPG, PPY819.J1, TMC129B0002A 1332, TMCT10D;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, PacketCable 2.0, MoCA 2.0, battery backup, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui_eth=14:CF:E2 }} {{TagLine|24x8 Telephony Wireless Gateway}} :{{ProductPage|}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000TnNmSAAV}}
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=438 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
A firmware update supposedly upgrades the device to 32x8 from 24x8 DOCSIS 3.0. :See [https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r30741437-Firmware-Arris-TG1682G ''(Firmware) Arris TG1682G'' on '''DSL Reports''']<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }}
